dct_title_s: Chorographia Terræ Sanctæ in angvstiorem formam redacta
dct_alternative_sm: Chorographia Terrae Sanctae in angustiorem formam redacta et ex variis auctoribus a multis erroribus expurgata
dct_description_sm: Coordinates approximate and based on Greenwich meridian.
Bar scale on map given in "Milliaria vmus horae".
Shows topography, drainage, boundaries, territorial boundaries of the tribes of Israel, travel routes, places of historical interest.
Features illustrations of a compass rose and ships.
Includes index and legend: Notarum explicatio.

17 pictorial vignettes surrounding map: [1] Cherubinus -- [2] Ornatus summi sacerdotis -- [3] Forma basium ac peluium aenearum -- [4] Mensa panum -- [5] Altare incensi aureum -- [6] Orientalis facies substructionis Templi Salomonis... -- [7] Prospectus in sancta sanctorum -- [8] Aspectus lateris sanctuary et coenaculi, ac turris superstructae vestibulo -- [9] Occidentalis aspectus sanctuary, caenaculi et turris supereminentis -- [10] Congius romanus antiquus -- [11] Siclus Israel Jerusalem sancta -- [12] Orientalis facies vestibuli sanctuary et turris superstructae -- [13] Arca testamenti cum cherubinis -- [14] Dispositio castrorum Israel in deserto -- [15] Altare holocaustorum aeneum -- [16] Candelabrum septiceps -- [17] Mare aeneum bobus impositum.
2 inset maps: Hierosolymae veteris imago -- Vestigum primum templi Hierosolymitani.
